diff --git a/mRemoteNGDocumentation/folders_and_inheritance.rst b/mRemoteNGDocumentation/folders_and_inheritance.rst
index 4805420c4..d77d3f4b4 100644
--- a/mRemoteNGDocumentation/folders_and_inheritance.rst
+++ b/mRemoteNGDocumentation/folders_and_inheritance.rst
@@ -76,3 +76,16 @@ related connections in the tree view.
 .. note::
    The Color property can be inherited just like other properties. Enable inheritance
    in the inheritance view to have connections automatically use their parent folder's color.
+
+Default Connection Properties & Inheritance
+===========================================
+
+In addition to folder inheritance, mRemoteNG allows you to set global **Default Connection Properties** and **Default Inheritance** settings.
+These defaults act as a template for all *new* connections you create.
+
+- **Default Connection Properties**: Sets the initial values for properties of new connections.
+- **Default Inheritance**: Sets which properties are inherited by default for new connections.
+
+These settings are accessible via the toolbar in the Connections panel.
+
+For more details, see :doc:`user_interface/default_connection_properties`.
